info.title: Corporate Account
info.description:
A company or organization that interacts with another
company.

A company or organization that interacts with another
company.

A company or organization that interacts with another
company.

sap.graph.CorporateAccount.title: CorporateAccount

createdAt.description: Date and time the entity was created.

changedAt.description: Date and time the entity was changed last.

displayId.description: Human-readable identifier for the corporate account.

name.description: The name of the corporate account.

additionalName.description: An additional name for the corporate account.

additionalName2.description: An additional name for the corporate account.

additionalName3.description: An additional name for the corporate account.

formattedName.description:
The formatted textual representation of the corporate
account.

legalForm.description: A legal entity that identifies the type corporate account.

language.description: The language used to communicate with the corporate account.

_language.description: The language used to communicate with the corporate account.

nielsenRegion.description:
Specifies a regional division according to the market
categories created by the A. C. Nielsen company.

industrySector.description:
Defines the branch of industry to which a corporate account
is assigned.

_industrySector.description:
Defines the branch of industry to which a corporate account
is assigned.

orderBlockingReason.description: The reason for blocking the corporate account.

deliveryBlockingReason.description: The reason for blocking deliveries to the corporate account.

billingBlockingReason.description: The reason for blocking billing to the corporate account.

contacts.description: The contacts for the corporate account.

addresses.description: The addresses for the corporate account.

roles.description: The roles for the corporate account.

identifications.description:
The identifications of the corporate account. An
identification number can be used as an alternative
identifier for the corporate account.

salesData.description: The sales data related to the corporate account.

texts.description: Long texts that refer to the corporate account.

taxNumbers.description: The tax numbers of the corporate account.

_salesQuotes.description: Sales quotes associated to the corporate account.

_salesOrders.description: Sales orders associated to the corporate account.

_salesContracts.description: Sales contracts associated to the corporate account.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Bank HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
